<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Grippli Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=693)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Grippli scouts typically keep watch on the outskirts of grippli settlements.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 15

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 10
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Grippli_GrippliScout.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 1">[Grippli Scout](/Monsters.aspx?ID=693)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="N" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Grippli" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=264" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 139 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 86</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Grippli](/Languages.aspx?ID=48)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +4, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** -1
</row>

**Items**
[Dart](/Weapons.aspx?ID=68) (5), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), net, [Sickle](/Weapons.aspx?ID=9)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +7 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 20

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 20 feet; jungle stride

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sickle +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
dart +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d4+1 piercing

**Hurl Net** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Requirements** The grippli is wielding a net in two hands; **Effect** The grippli makes a ranged Strike (with a +9 modifier) against a Medium or smaller creature within 20 feet. On a hit, the target is [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) and takes a –10-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds. On a critical hit, the creature is [restrained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=33) instead. The DC to [Escape](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) the net is 16. A creature adjacent to the target can Interact with the net to remove it.

**Jungle Stride**   Gripplis ignore difficult terrain in forests and jungles.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-110" />
name: Grippli Scout
